title: Herbal Therapy — Integrative Health + Sports Medicine
description: Integrative Health and Sports Medicine treats people of all ages and all fitness levels through physical therapy, acupuncture, and lifestyle changes. We're based in Cincinnati, Ohio, and offer physical therapy services and acupuncture services to professional athletes and everyday people.
cleaned_text: Herbal Therapy Herbal Therapy, also known as phytotherapy, supports our patients' overall health. Each treatment is tailor-made for an individual's unique needs. Unlike pharmaceuticals, herbal therapy uses the therapeutic benefits of the entire plant, rather than extracting one element for one symptom. Herbal Therapy often includes herbal remedies and supplements as well as hydration recommendations, lifestyle changes and detoxification practices for a better functioning body. This centuries-old treatment does more than pacify symptoms. Herbal Therapy targets the root cause of various issues for true wellbeing for all.
